Correct, this is not a collection of pure funky housemusic. As described, this is a collection of all the mainstream hits over a period of 40 years, that includes a lot of funk from the 70?s and 80?s, and a lot of house from the 80?s, 90?s. The majority of the house music can be labelled ?Deep House?, especially housemusic from 1990 to 1995, but some techno can be found here as well.

And you are absolutely correct, Hed Kandi makes some very fine collections of funky housemusic :)

Eh! "Funky House!?!?!"

What a crock of commercial shit! Surely pop hits from a funky house perspective would be, for example, James Brown, Giorgio Moroder, Donna Summer, Arthur Baker, New Order, Human League not the cunting Backstreet Boys or Culture Beat!!! Culture Beat!!! Did Jesus die on the cross so we'd be forced to listen to cocking Culture Beat!

I'm not knocking you for sharing tunes you like but this is about as mistitled a torrent as you could possibly find. Unless there's one out there titled '1000 great Italian recipes' that contains nothing but pictures of circuit boards on fire...Idiot.
really good music!!! thanks for this torrent!!!
Also greatful for the upload, theres a lot of random tracks there I'd been after.. but to call it Funky House, nope no way. Its mainstream plain and simple.

Correct, this is not a collection of pure funky housemusic. As described, this is a collection of all the mainstream hits over a period of 40 years, that includes a lot of funk from the 70's and 80's, and a lot of house from the 80's, 90's. The majority of the house music can be labeled "Deep House", especially housemusic from 1990 to 1995, but some techno can be found here as well.
Great work softsofty. Thanks so much for sharing!
Files name are too long...
To long for what? Can't be no shorter than Artist+track?

softsofty at 2007-07-22 00:15 CET:
...a lot of house from the 80's, 90's. The majority of the house music can be labeled "Deep House", especially housemusic from 1990 to 1995, but some techno can be found here as well.

What is house music to you?
2 Unlimited, Benny Benassi, Culture Beat, Technotronic?

Thanks for the effort but no thanks.

Wow, look who?s talking. With an upload like this: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3298365/melodifestivalen_2005, you must be the biggest House expert out there. 
HALLOOO, this is a collection of HITS, if you read the first line in the description of this torrent it clearly says that this is mainstream. BUT: you will find some funky house stuff in here as well.
You obviously do not know any of the good house stuff from back in the 90?s, you were properly running around and shitting your pants back then. You recournize the mainstream crap like 2 Unlimited, Benny Benassi, Culture Beat, Technotronic, and think: ?Ohh, that must be what he think is house music?. 

I?ll give you some Deep house examples:
  Alcatraz - Giv Me Luv (1996)
  Clubland - Hold On (1991)
  Crystal Waters - Makin' Happy (Hurley's Happy House Mix) (1991)
  Double Dee - Found Love (1990)
  Heller & Farley Project - Ultra Flava (Vox Version) (1996)
  Kym Sims - Too Blind To See It (1992)
  Mark Morrison - Return of the Mack (Joe T. Vannelli Light Mix) (1996)
  Robin S - Show Me Love (1993)
  Rosie Gaines - Closer That Close (1995)

And just because some of those tracks made it in to the charts, does not make them any less funky!

If you do not want to download this? just stay away and shut up, you moron!

But I?ll give you this? The Trance Aumatic Remix of 2 Unlimited - Faces from 1993, is fucking funky deep house to me?
